properties.entry: INSERT INTO BOOK (BOOK_NO , SELLER , BOOK_NAME , PRICE , AUTHOR , PUBLISHER , IS_NOTED , CONDITION , IS_DIRECT , LOCATION) VALUES (SEQ_BKNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO BOOK_ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO , BOOK_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_BKFNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BKNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ?)
SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NAME , PRICE , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS TITLEIMG FROM BOOK B LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOK_ATTACHMENT USING (BOOK_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y';
